item.title: Mac OS Notes
item.description: Mac Os tips and Notes Take screen shotes website with pictures and more info https://www.wikihow.com/Take-a-Screenshot-on-a-Mac Run the grab software and a icon will be in the dock right click for options to capture. In short the combination keys below to take screenshots. cmd + shift + 3 for complete screen capture and save a file to desktop cmd + shift + 4 for selection of the screen capture and save a file to desktop
